dc_description_s: Maryland Tax Pacels, 2017 is a polygon theme representing tax parcels and lots in various Maryland counties from the year 2010-2017. The counties included are Allegany, Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Calvert, Caroline, Carroll , Cecil, Charles, Dorchester, Frederick, Garrett, Harford, Howard, Kent, Montgomery, Prince George, Queen Annes, St. Marys, Somerset, Talbot, Washington, Wicomico, Worcester, Baltimore City. Attribute information typically includes details regarding the address, ownership and valuation of the lot as well as information regarding structures on the parcel. Accompaning layers will usually include street centerlines and county boundy layers.  Additional cadastral and property files are included, though the content and format of these additional files may vary. All files were collected and published by Boundary Solutions as part of the National ParcelMap Data Portal.
